text:
Based on an OS : Linux RedHat 3

this error message is polluting the error_log file :
[Thu Oct 26 15:53:38 2006] [error] (88)Socket operation on non-socket: 
apr_accept: (client socket)

at the same time we have regular shutdowns as if the memory was entirely full.

I don't find the list of error message in the online documentation !

Cheers.
creator: michel.claverie@orange-ftgroup.com

text: closing very old 2.0 report, presumably fixed at least in a later release.
creator: covener@gmail.com
